article_title: FTC Signals Aggressive Stance On Healthcare Mergers

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: A Federal Trade Commission challenge of a proposed merger of the largest hospital operators in Chicago could be a problematic sign for the rest of the rapidly consolidating U.S. healthcare industry. Advocate Health Care and NorthShore University HealthSystem say they will fight a complaint filed by the FTC, which voted 4-0 to [...]
